title: FT/FS: Pelty and Harry Davis Piedmont Factory 42  SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Pelty and Harry Davis Piedmont Factory 42  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade or sell these 2.  Piedmont 350/460 with the tough Factory 42. Trying to get EPDGs I don't have but willing to sell them. 

Pelty is Beckett raw reviewed with a grade of 1.
Davis is Beckett raw reviewed with a grade of 1.5.

Both have excellent fronts with some paper loss on the back.

PENDING SALE
Would ask $SOLD for Pelty and $SOLD for Davis. But of course will entertain offers.
